mapper.select: select up.user_no likeuser, up.playlist_no playlistNo, p.playlist_date playlistDate, p.playlist_name playlistName, p.emo_no emoNo, p.user_no userNo, u.nickname from user_playlist up, playlist p, users u where up.playlist_no = p.playlist_no and p.user_no = u.user_no and up.user_no = #{userNo}
